ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Attack speedups
ygData.msgSnippet: ... his ... Well, you need a new cleric. But I know how hard good groups are to come by, and that is easier said than done. ... Yup, I could never play it
ygData.messageBody:
>I would try that, but the cleric would probably just let me die to prove
his
>point.

Well, you need a new cleric. But I know how hard good groups are to come by,
and that is easier said than done.

>In Sol A it is a big taunt. If I play Hymn and my two other songs I
>definitely get the bulk of the attention.

Yup, I could never play it there without it costing me big. The other night
fighting hill giants I actually used it to taunt the giant off the Enchanter
(and surprisingly the Monk who would out taunt *me*)

>The last 6 times we have had
>deaths in our Sol A groups, on 5 of them the deaths have gone like this.

I spent a lot of time in Sol A around 22-25 I LOVE that place, I rarely
died, in part because of a warrior who knew how to taunt and a cleric who
knew not to burn...and they were in the same room IRL so that didn't hurt.
:o)

Fighting: DDD, CoD, Largos and Anthem,
Losing: Lullaby for the greens, the Bard is last one out. This worked
because the cleric healed and the warrior taunted, so if anyone called a
zone it was because they were in trouble which was baaad news. When I got in
trouble I just zoned while they kept at it and I would try to sneak back for
the exp.
Pulling: Elemental Rhythms


Tszaaz E'Taurguin
